message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Time is against you.
I'm being generous, but don't push your luck Alice. The clock is ticking!
I'm willing to be fair, Bob. But you need to meet me halfway. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is more than fair. Take it before inflation eats away any more of our potential winnings!
Bob, I'm standing my ground. This is a fair deal, take it or leave it. Time is running out.
Alice, I'm serious. We're running out of time and this is the best I can offer.  Don't let greed make us both losers!
